body_html: The medium term plan for language bindings is to go through the C API. We're in the process of moving functionality from Python to C++, at which point it will also be exposed through an extended C API. Moving stuff out of Python to C++ isn't relevant for PyPy, but the improved C API might make it easy to write a separate PyPy interface.
body_text: The medium term plan for language bindings is to go through the C API. Moving stuff out of Python to C++ isn't relevant for PyPy, but the improved C API might make it easy to write a separate PyPy interface.
body: The medium term plan for language bindings is to go through the C API.  We're in the process of moving functionality from Python to C++, at which point it will also be exposed through an extended C API.  Moving stuff out of Python to C++ isn't relevant for PyPy, but the improved C API might make it easy to write a separate PyPy interface.
